attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of all motor cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are we still allowing the sale and use of cars when all they do is maim and kill motorcyclists and pedestrians, car drivers drive around in there cosseted world with the radio playing and the heater up high not paying any attention to the world around them, they are a menace to themselves and everyone around them, the accident rates for cars are truly horrendous it is time we stopped these 4 wheeled menaces killing our motorcyclists and our children, the drivers are barely trained and are allowed to kill and maim.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
